name: Jewels Adventure Puzzle
description:
1010! Block Puzzle Jewel has the highest rank in 1010 game with online ranking and free to play titre game !
Kill boring time with free titre game and enjoy the different way play 1010!

1010! Block Puzzle Jewel is the tangram-inspired puzzle game sensation that’s taking AppStore by storm. Fill the board by dragging different shaped blocks into the correct place to make a single larger shape. If you think it sounds simple then think again! There’s many solution for fill the horizon or vertical block and pieces can’t be rotated. 8x8 is the largest map you can play!
This 1010! game is block puzzle game like jewel puzzle ,tap blox,qubed,8x8,titre …You can spend your time 1010 game and take the highest score. You can beat more competitor in 1010 Golden Block Puzzle and become the champion of block puzzle game.
1010! Block Puzzle Jewel provide more active item like harmer and hint in order to help you reach the target in high score board. In titre game over screen, you can see the leaderboard and you can know where you are in 1010!
1010! Block Puzzle Jewel is amazing value that’ll keep you busy for hours. For even more replayability, there’s also It is incredibly intuitive and fun for all ages and skill levels. Once you’ve tried, you’ll be hooked and qubed!

Key Features:
- Free to play titre game
- Jewel Graphic for best titre gameplay
- Hard and different each time you replay than other jewel puzzle game
- Rank up in the leaderboards, challenge your friends with titre game via Block Puzzle Games

- More special items now
